testcase.name: Validating the menu option
testcase.system-out: Given User should be logged into the homepage7..............................passed When User clicks on Mobiles symbol Button...................................passed And User clicks on desired model here we are clicking Samsung model Button..passed And User selects desired model here we are selecting SAMSUNG Galaxy F12 model.passed And The new Child Window opens..............................................passed And User clicks on add to cart Button.......................................passed And User clicks on Buy now Button...........................................passed Then The the Buy now Product page is displayed..............................passed
